# 前言 {.unnumbered}

This is a Quarto book.

To learn more about Quarto books visit <https://quarto.org/docs/books>.

```{r}
# 方法1：使用curve函数直接绘制指数函数
curve(exp(x), from = -2, to = 2, 
      main = "自然指数函数 y = e^x",
      xlab = "x", ylab = "y",
      col = "red", lwd = 2,
      ylim = c(0, 8))

# 添加坐标轴和网格线
abline(h = 0, col = "gray", lty = 2)  # x轴
abline(v = 0, col = "gray", lty = 2)  # y轴
grid()  # 添加网格

# 标记特殊点 (0, 1)
points(0, 1, pch = 16, col = "blue", cex = 1.5)
text(0.3, 1.2, "(0, 1)", col = "blue")
```
